forms\/change_status_on_comment: Change status when user is commenting?
forms\/comment_maximum: The comment must be a maximum of 10000 characters.
forms\/comment_minimum: The comment must be a minimum of 3 characters.
forms\/confirm_delete_comment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
forms\/confirm_delete_submisssion: Are you sure you want to delete this submission?
forms\/delete_form: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar este formulario? </br> Advertencia: Todos los datos que pertenecen a este formulario se eliminarán como preguntas y envíos.
forms\/delete_status: Seguro que quieres eliminar este estado?
forms\/field_name_maximum: El nombre del campo debe tener un máximo de 255 caracteres
forms\/field_name_minimum: El nombre del campo debe tener un mínimo de 2 caracteres.
forms\/form_icon_maximum: El icono no puede tener mas de 64 letras.
forms\/form_name_maximum: El nombre que ha ingresado tiene mas de 32 letras.
forms\/form_name_minimum: Introdusca un nombre de mas de 2 letras por favor.
forms\/form_url: URL del formulario (Use el / en las url, asi /ejemplo)

forms\/form_url_minimum: Introdusca una url de mas de 2 letras por favor.
forms\/form_url_slash: Form URL must begin with a /
forms\/input_field_name: Por favor introdusca un nombre al campo
forms\/input_form_name: Por favor introdusca un nombre a el formulario.
forms\/input_form_url: Por favor introdusca una url valida para el formulario
forms\/new_update_available_x: There is a new update available for the module {{module}}
forms\/new_urgent_update_available_x: There is a new urgent update available for the module {{module}}. Please update as soon as possible!
forms\/options_help: Cada opción en una nueva línea; puede dejarse vacío (solo opciones).
forms\/select_statuses_to_form: Select statuses to be used on this form
forms\/send_notify_email: Send notify email (Will add submit slowness)
forms\/show_navigation_link_for_guest: Show navigation link for guest and ask they to login if them don't have post permission
forms\/status_creation_error: Error al crear un estado. Asegúrese de que el estado html no tenga más de 1024 caracteres.
forms\/status_forms: Select forms where this status will be displayed on. (Ctrl+click to select/deselect multiple)
forms\/status_groups: Select groups who are allowed to select this status. (Ctrl+click to select/deselect multiple)
forms\/submission_updated_message: There has been an update regarding your submission for {{form}}.
forms\/updated_form_submission_staff: New form submission comment from staff

forms\/x_field_minimum_y: {{field}} must be a minimum of {{min}} characters.
